title: Showing black screen on champion select.
body:
While I queued with my friend, when I joined the game, soon as the sound came up for champion select the client just showed black screen and no sound. The friend I was queuing with was fine so this was a weird issue and now cost few minutes being unable to join the game.

Could you fix this issue?

replies.body: I have had this problem for the past 4 days and multiple people have posted the same thing since the new patch update. Riot hasn't replied yet
